sense.def:
To acknowledge a fact or a situation
pomeni sprejeti dejstvo ali položaj za resničnega ali pravilnega.

seg.quote: He was acknowledged as America's finest writer.
Most people will now acknowledge that there is a crisis.

sense.def:
To acknowledge someone
pomeni pokazati, da smo tistega človeka videli in vemo, kdo je.

To acknowledge a message, letter, or parcel
pomeni sporočiti človeku, ki nam je poslal sporočilo, pismo ali paket, da smo pošiljko prejeli.

seg.quote: You have to sign here and acknowledge receipt.
